mapper.select: select employee.employee_id, connect.enterprise_id, connect.team_name, employee.employees from employee, connect where connect.employee_id = employee.employee_id
mapper.insert: insert into employee(employee_id, employees, doctor, master, graduate, bachelor, college, tec_secondary, tec_activists, rad_number, returnees, talents, trainee, employment) values (#{employeeId}, #{employees}, #{doctor}, #{master}, #{graduate}, #{bachelor}, #{college}, #{tecSecondary}, #{tecActivists}, #{radNumber}, #{returnees}, #{talents}, #{trainee}, #{employment})
